docs.snippet: Outside the Supreme Court on Thursday, protesters expressed disappointment with a ruling that blocked President Obama’s plan to allow some illegal immigrants to work legally....

docs.lead_paragraph: Outside the Supreme Court on Thursday, protesters expressed disappointment with a ruling that blocked President Obama’s plan to allow some illegal immigrants to work legally.

headline.main: New York City Heightens Security for Sunday's Gay Pride Parade
headline.print_headline: New York City Heightens Security for Sunday's Gay Pride Parade

docs.snippet: New York City police will send more officers to safeguard Sunday's annual gay pride parade, boosting security at the event that is expected to attract more than 1.6 million spectators just days after the June 12 mass shooting in Orlando, city offi...
docs.lead_paragraph: New York City police will send more officers to safeguard Sunday's annual gay pride parade, boosting security at the event that is expected to attract more than 1.6 million spectators just days after the June 12 mass shooting in Orlando, city officials said on Thursday.

headline.main: Black Boxes From Crashed EgyptAir Flight Will Go to France for Repair

headline.main: Lewis, Who Shed Blood for Civil Rights, Leads Dems on Guns
headline.print_headline: Lewis, Who Shed Blood for Civil Rights, Leads Dems on Guns

headline.main: Former Pentagon Official Pleads Guilty in 'Fat Leonard' Case
headline.print_headline: Former Pentagon Official Pleads Guilty in 'Fat Leonard' Case

docs.snippet: A former senior contracting officer for the U.S. Defense Department pleaded guilty on Thursday to charges he accepted bribes from a foreign defense contractor at the center of a corruption and fraud scandal, the U.S. Justice Department said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former senior contracting officer for the U.S. Defense Department pleaded guilty on Thursday to charges he accepted bribes from a foreign defense contractor at the center of a corruption and fraud scandal, the U.S. Justice Department said.
